entry.title: [GRA2][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work Room G201
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 13, 21:00 UTC  -  Feb 14, 00:00 UTC

Jan 27, 13:16 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

This will affect availability of your servers.

Start time : 13/02/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 14/02/2025 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unavailable during the maintenance operation
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out an electrical upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters.

To protect your data from any impact, we advise you to first restart your machines in rescue mode (How to activate and use rescue mode) before the operation mentioned above

Every client concerned by this maintenance will be contacted.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG3][Cooling System] - Rack S311B03
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 8, 08:00 - 21:00 UTC

Jan 20, 23:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.
Start time : 08/02/2025 08:00 UTC

The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration.
Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SGP/MRS][Backbone] Latency
entry.content:
Jan 27, 09:05 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the link between SGP and MRS has been resolved since 25/01/2025 .
All the services are operational.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 25/01/2025 02:10 UTC
End time : 25/01/2025 14:55 UTC
Service impact : Latency between Europe and APAC increased.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a maintenance of one of our provider.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
